title: 325F.10 BANNING OF HAZARDOUS ARTICLES; RULES.
text:
The commissioner shall ban from sale or distribution any toy or other article intended for use by children that presents any of the hazards set out in section 325F.08.
The commissioner shall adopt the rules necessary to carry out the intent of sections 325F.08 to 325F.18. Rules shall insofar as practicable conform to the rules relating to this subject found as part 191 in the Code of Federal Regulations, title 21.
